snippet.title: Pulling No Punches - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Pulling No Punches is a satirical game in the 2D beat'em up style with classic arcade influences and modern visuals.

The game tells the fictional story of a global pandemic that engulfed the world and is being ignored by fanatics who do not believe that the disease is real. It is up to the main characters, 4 common citizens adequately protected with gloves and mask, to deal with these fanatics and solve the situation with the force of their own fists.
